title: Eva Och Adam
overview: Adam will start in a new class where he does not know anyone. Most of all, he only wants to sink through the earth and disappear. But he soon becomes a friend with the cheeky Alexander and at a party with Annika, he finally becomes a friend of Eva, who in turn is a friend of Annika. Adam finally begins to feel that he is in love with Eva... but is Eva in love with him? And maybe there is someone else in love with Adam?
